page.title: 13Leisure Activities
page.content: It is notable that there are few organized clubs in the area.There is the gym club and a lot in Easingwold but most people list their activities as being home-based.For example television,gardening,videos,bird watching,computers,decorating,snooker, pets and horses were all popular.The only major exceptions were going to the pub _ two in Raskelf,seven in Easingwold _ and eating out.The reasons for this are probably that with the major activity being farming many families are too busy in the evenings and at weekends to travel far or have time for a regular club.Certainly most preferred to travel no further than Easingwold,going to York only when essential and rarely for the cinema,theatre or music it offered.
